data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Almeida, Thais Elias, Salino, Alexandre, Dubuisson, Jean-Yves, Hennequin, Sabine (2017): Adetogramma (Polypodiaceae), a new monotypic fern genus segregated from Polypodium. PhytoKeys 78: 109-131, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.78.12189, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.78.12189
